column1: oxidized copper greens meeting holographic lilac
desert ochre fused with ultraviolet chrome
graphite and pearl layered like circuit sediment
magnetic rust bleeding into cobalt mist
infrared red against bleached limestone
silicon pink over petroleum black
teal patina merging with vaporwave violet
corroded brass glinting under cyan haze
terra cotta shadowed by spectral magenta
ashen clay brightened with phosphor streaks
deep hematite crossed by laser turquoise
dusty mauve grounded by titanium grey
soft amber refracted through glassy neon
manganese blue bleeding into iridescent silver
mercury grey reflecting synthetic lavender
carbon black fading into luminous coral
ochre dust mixed with prismatic interference
chrome olive shimmering over muted sand
ceramic white veined with circuitry blue
burnt sienna glowing under aurora teal
